old: ワイは第十のたかし。工事担当者や。
column2: I am the tenth Takashi. I am in charge of the construction.

old: ここを拡張するなら、納品してや
column2: If you're going to expand this place, you're going to have to deliver.

old: たしかに受け取ったで。
工事が終わったら、来週には入口のおっさんが
column2: Once the construction is finished, the old man at the entrance will let you know next week!

old: ここはすでに工事済みやで！
column2: This place is already under construction!

old:
すまん・・・
今週はワイらほかの工事で手いっぱいやねん。
column2:
Sorry...
We have our hands full with other construction this week.
